text: Michel Kafando (born 18 August 1942) is a Burkinabé politician. He was transitional President of Burkina Faso from 2014"Michel Kafando, Président de la Transition", Burkina24, 17 November 2014. to 2015. He worked in the government as Minister of Foreign Affairs from 1982 to 1983 and was the Permanent Representative (Ambassador) of Burkina Faso to the United Nations from 1998 to 2011."New Permanent Representative of Burkina Faso presents credentials", United Nations press release, BIO/3152, 15 April 1998. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Burkina Faso Category:Ambassadors to the United Nations
title: Michel Kafando
